Articles.Content:
After either timewarping or loading the craft from the tracking station, my spacecraft completely disassembles itself and sends parts flying across the solar system at 50% the speed of light. I play realism overhaul on 1.2.2, so the save is heavily modded.

Where this happens: it only happens when the craft is in deep space. For example, I'm sending a probe to Venus, but cannot perform the capture burn because my ship keeps exploding.

output log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/i0vleh0p582wgqs/output_log.txt?dl=0

Thanks!
